lead_paragraph: Prosecutors found that the officers misused force and delayed medical care for Lei Yang, a 29-year-old environmentalist, but declined to take the widely watched case further.

byline.original: By CHRIS BUCKLEY and ADAM WU

headline.print_headline: No Trial for Beijing Officers Over Death of Environmentalist in Police Custody
headline.main: No Trial for Beijing Officers Over Death of Environmentalist

snippet: Prosecutors found that the officers misused force and delayed medical care for Lei Yang, a 29-year-old environmentalist, but declined to take the widely watched case further....
